Needville Mayor & City Council

City Council Information

The City of Needville is a Type A General Law City and the City Council members are elected to serve two year terms. Terms are staggered and the City hold their annual election each May. The City Council meets regularly at City Hall on the second Wednesday of each month. Residents and the public are welcome and encouraged to attend City Council Meetings. Agendas for the meetings are p osted in advance both on the website and on the bulletin board at City Hall, located at 9022 Main Street.

Chad Nesvadba, Mayor

mayornesvadba@cityofneedville.com
